text:
Selena Gomez has opened up about that time Nick Jonas managed to ruin their date in Central Park over 10 years ago.

For anyone who missed the ultimate Disney relationship of 2008 – Selena and Nick were rumoured to be in a relationship around the same time BFF Taylor Swift was dating Jonas Brothers heartthrob Joe Jonas.

Let's get checking out an update from MTV News...

The gang ultimately went on a few group dates together, which is something that Selena told the BBC Radio 1 Breakfast Show didn’t actually go down so well.

As part of a game that features the 25-year-old hooked up to a heart monitor, DJ Nick Grimshaw enlisted the help of Selena Gomez to recall how their date in New York went from bad to worse.



"Hello Nicholas, it is Selena Gomez," she began in the video message. "So I know what you're doing and I would like to remind you of a time where we all went to Central Park together, it was definitely over 10 years ago.

“I was wondering if that brought up anything for you, I know Central Park was really beautiful, it was actually my first time."

That’s when Nick admitted that his determination to protect their privacy resulted in ruining the date: "OK so this was at a time when my brothers and I were a boy band and we were in Central Park and we were very private about our relationship," Nick said.

"And she was unhappy that her Central Park experience was ruined by the fact that I walked about 20 feet away from her. Even though they were taking pictures of us and obviously we were there together it was like, 'It would be better if we stand about 25 feet apart.'"

Getty

Nick continued: "So it ruined her Central Park experience, so her and Taylor Swift, who was dating my brother Joe—but we never confirmed it—walked 25 feet behind us as we walked through the park by ourselves."

We can see why that didn't take the gong for best date of all time, tbh.
title: Selena Gomez Confronts Nick Jonas Over A Date He Ruined Ten Years Ago

og.description: In fairness, this does sound pretty terrible.
